quotes.message: If you would wish another to keep your secret, first keep it yourself.
quotes.name: Seneca

quotes.message: Secrecy is the enemy of efficiency, but don't let anyone know it.
quotes.name: Ric Ocasek

quotes.message: A secret's worth depends on the people from whom it must be kept.
quotes.name: Carlos Ruiz Zafon

quotes.message: Secrecy is a vacuum and nothing fills a vacuum like paranoid speculation.
quotes.name: Max Brooks

quotes.message: In the mind and nature of a man a secret is an ugly thing, like a hidden physical defect.
quotes.name: Isak Dinesen

quotes.message: Some secrets are like fossils and the stone has become too heavy to turn over.
quotes.name: Delphine de Vigan

quotes.message: Secrets tend to get revealed when you're feeling most loved and when you're feeling most betrayed.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: Secrecy can spring from the best motives; but as it grows it begins to exist only for itself, only for its own sake, only to cover its own abuses.
quotes.name: Christopher Dodd

quotes.message: Secrecy is the soul of all great designs. Perhaps more has been effected by concealing our own intentions than by discovering those of our enemy.
quotes.name: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.message: Privacy is something that we maintain for the good of ourselves and others. Secrecy we keep to separate ourselves from others, even those we love.
quotes.name: Mary Alice Monroe

quotes.message: Secrets are things we give to others to keep for us.
quotes.name: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.message: Secrecy has many advantages, for when you tell someone the purpose of any object right away, they often think there is nothing to it.
quotes.name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.message: Secrecy is the element of all goodness; even virtue, even beauty is mysterious.
quotes.name: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.message: Our secrets are the walls that separate us and the bridges that connect us with others and who we truly are.
quotes.name: Frank Warren

quotes.message: Secrecy sets barriers between men, but at the same time offers the seductive temptation to break through the barriers by gossip or confession.
quotes.name: Georg Simmel

quotes.message: Privacy seems not an illusion for those who want to believe in secrecy principle.
quotes.name: Toba Beta

quotes.message: People addicted to secrecy are so without knowing why; they are not so for cause, but for secrecy's sake.
quotes.name: William Hazlitt

quotes.message: Secrecy is best taught by starting with ourselves.
quotes.name: Nicolas Chamfort

quotes.message: Secrecy, being an instrument of conspiracy, ought never to be the system of a regular government.
quotes.name: Jeremy Bentham

quotes.message: Our secrets are what keep us sick and as soon as we are able to expose them to another person, that is when the healing begins.
quotes.name: Phillip L. Smith

quotes.message: Secret enmities are more to be feared than open ones.
quotes.name: Cicero

quotes.message: A secret is most valuable when it remains a secret.
quotes.name: Brian Herbert

quotes.message: Secrets are pleasant to each child of Eve.
quotes.name: Hannah Cowley

quotes.message: The man who can keep a secret may be wise, but he is not half as wise as the man with no secrets to keep.
quotes.name: Edgar Watson Howe

quotes.message: Secrecy is the chastity of friendship.
quotes.name: Jeremy Taylor

quotes.message: A secret is seldom safe in more than one breast.
quotes.name: Swift

quotes.message: Secrecy involves a tension which, at the moment of revelation, finds its release.
quotes.name: Georg Simmel

quotes.message: Secrets have a way of making themselves felt, even before you know there's a secret.
quotes.name: Jean Ferris

quotes.message: To keep your secret is wisdom; but to expect others to keep it is folly.
quotes.name: Samuel Johnson
